content: this chunky slipper pattern is a great project for beginners who are comfortable casting on and knitting they make great gifts for the holidays and knit up quickly because they re made with super chunky yarn the slippers are knit flat and then seamed together to create an invisible join a single_crochet is added to the foot opening to create a neat edge an optional ribbed cuff is also available for those who want a bootie style slipper this pattern includes three sizes child adult small and adult large finished measurements the width of the slipper is 8 8 9 8 10 7 the length is variable because the slipper is customised for individual foot sizes the adult small fits an average women s foot while the adult large fits an average man s foot the child size is sized to fit a four to eight-year-old the body of the slipper requires 110 yds for child size 120 yds for adult small and 140 yds for adult large approximately 10 yds is required for the pom poms for cozy winter lounging look no further than these chunky slippers
